entry.title: Flood Warning issued September 10 at 2:48PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A GLACIER-DAMMED LAKE OUTBURST REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT SUNDAY ALONG KENAI RIVER... * WHAT...Flooding caused by a glacier-dammed lake outburst continues. * WHERE...Kenai River below Skilak Lake, including Kenai Keys. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Sunday Sep 17. * IMPACTS...Flooding of Kenai River and flood-prone locations is

entry.title: Flood Warning issued September 10 at 9:17AM AKDT by NWS

entry.summary: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents and breaking waves due to elevated surf of 3 to 5 feet. Higher surf of 6 feet or more is no longer expected. * WHERE...Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands, Ventura County

entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued September 09 at 1:52PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT DUE TO ELEVATED PARTICULATE MATTER LEVELS FROM WINDBLOWN DUST... The South Coast AQMD has issued an air quality alert due to increased particulate matter from blowing dust. The air quality alert is in effect until Monday at 7 AM. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 1:49AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Patchy Dense Fog This Morning... Plan on patchy dense fog this morning across the foothills and piedmont of Virginia and North Carolina. This includes the Roanoke Valley and Southside Virginia. The visibility will change rapidly down to one half mile or less in dense fog, especially along area rivers and lakes.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Caswell; Rockingham; Stokes; Surry; Wilkes; Yadkin
